( James Quigg / Daily Press via AP , File ) BARSTOW , Calif . ( AP ) — A self - styled daredevil died Saturday after a rocket in which he launched himself crashed into the ground , a colleague and a witness VBD . “ Mad ” Mike Hughes died after the homemade rocket crashed on private property near Barstow about 1:52 p.m. near Highway 247 , the Daily Press of Victorville reported . Waldo Stakes , a colleague who was at the rocket launch , VBD Hughes , 64 , was killed . “ It was unsuccessful , and he passed away , ” Stakes VBD The Associated Press . He declined further comment . Justin Chapman , a freelance journalist , VBD the AP that he and his wife witnessed the crash . The rocket appeared to rub against the launch apparatus , which might have torn the parachutes attached to it , Chapman VBD . The rocket came straight down into the ground , Chapman VBD . According to a San Bernardino County Sheriff ’s Department statement , deputies were called to the event . “ A NN was pronounced deceased after the rocket crashed in the open desert during a rocket launch event , ” the statement VBD . The sheriff ’s department did not identify the person who died . In March 2018 , Hughes , who believed the NNP is JJ , propelled himself about 1,875 NNS into the air before a hard landing in the Mojave Desert . “ My story RB is incredible , ” Hughes VBD the AP at the NN . “ It ’s got a bunch of story lines — the garage - built thing . I ’m an older guy . It ’s out in the middle of nowhere , plus the NNP NNP . The problem is it brings out all the nuts RB , NNS questioning everything . It ’s the downside of all this . ”

text: Dressed in stark white spacesuits against the backdrop of a desolate , auburn terrain of stony plains and sand dunes , CD NNS test a geo - radar by dragging the JJ box across the rocky sand . Communication from mission command in the Alps is delayed CD minutes , so when the geo - radar stops working , the CD walk back to their all - terrain vehicles and radio colleagues nearby at base camp for guidance . But this is n't the Red NNP - it 's the Arabian Peninsula . The desolate desert in southern Oman , near the borders of Yemen and Saudi Arabia , resembles Mars so much that more than 200 NNS from 25 nations chose it as their location for the next four weeks , to field - test technology for a manned mission to Mars . JJ and private ventures are racing toward Mars - both JJ NNP Barack Obama and SpaceX founder Elon Musk declared NNS MD walk on the Red NNP in a few decades . JJ challengers IN NNP are joining the NNP NNPS and NNP in NN with an ambitious , if vague , Mars program . Aerospace corporations IN BlueOrigin have published schematics of future bases , ships and suits . The successful launch of SpaceX Falcon Heavy rocket this week " puts us in a completely JJ realm of what we can put into deep NN , what we can send to Mars , " VBD analog astronaut Kartik Kumar . The next step to Mars , he VBZ , is to tackle non-engineering problems IN JJ emergency responses and isolation . " These are things I VBP can't be underestimated , " Kumar VBD . While cosmonauts and astronauts are learning valuable spacefaring skills on the International NNP Station - and the US is VBG virtual reality to train NNS - the majority of work to prepare for interplanetary expeditions is being done on NNP . And where best to field - test equipment and NNS for the journey to Mars but on some of the NN 's most forbidding spots ? Seen from NN , the Dhofar Desert is a JJ , brown expanse . Few animals or plants survive in the desert expanses of the Arabian Peninsula , where NNS can top 125 degrees Fahrenheit , or 51 degrees Celsius . On the eastern edge of a seemingly endless dune is the Oman Mars Base : a giant 2.4 - ton inflated habitat surrounded by shipping containers turned into labs and crew quarters . There are no airlocks . The desert 's NN resembles Mars so much , it 's hard to tell the difference , Kumar VBD , his spacesuit caked in dust . " But it goes deeper than that : the types of geomorphology , all the structures , the salt domes , the riverbeds , the wadis , it parallels a lot of what we VBP on Mars . " The Omani NN offered to host the Austrian NNP Forum 's next Mars simulation during a meeting of the NNP Nation 's Committee On the Peaceful Uses of Outer NNP . Gernot Groemer , commander of the Oman Mars simulation and a veteran of 11 NN missions on NNP , VBD the forum quickly accepted . NNS from across the NN sent ideas for experiments and the mission , named AMADEE - 18 , quickly grew to 16 scientific experiments , such as testing a " tumbleweed " whip - fast robot rover and a JJ NN suit called Aouda . The cutting - edge spacesuit , weighing about 50 kilograms , is called a " personal spaceship " because PRP can breathe , eat and do hard NN inside it . The suit 's visor displays maps , communications and sensor NNS . A blue piece of foam in front of the chin can be VBN to wipe your nose and mouth . " No matter who is VBG to this grandest voyage of our society yet to come , I VBP a few things we learn here will be actually implemented in those missions , " Groemer VBD . The Soviet Union 's 1957 launch of Sputnik ignited a NN race between Moscow and NNP to land a crew on the NNP . But before the U.S. got there RB , astronauts IN Neil Armstrong trained suspended on pulleys to simulate CD - sixth of NNP 's gravity . Hostile environments from Arizona to Siberia were VBN to fine - tune capsules , landers , rovers and suits - simulating otherworldly dangers to be VBN beyond NNP . NN agencies call them " analogues " because they resemble extraterrestrial extremes of cold and remoteness . " You can test systems on those locations and VB where the breaking points are , and you can VB where things start to fail and which design option you VBP to take in order to assure that it does not fail on Mars , " VBD João Lousada , CD of the Oman simulation 's deputy field commanders who is a flight controller for the International NNP Station . Faux NN stations have been built underwater off the coast of Florida , on frigid dark deserts of Antarctica , and in volcanic craters in Hawaii , according to " Packing For Mars , " a favourite book among JJ Mars NNS , written by Mary Roach . " Terrestrial analogs are a tool in the toolkit of NN exploration , but they are not a panacea , " VBD Scott Hubbard , VBN as " Mars Czar " back when he lead the US NN agency 's Mars program . Some simulations have helped developed cameras , rovers , suits and closed - loop NN - support systems , he VBD . NNP VBD the Mojave Desert to test rovers destined for the Red NNP but they RB discovered much about how NNS can adapt . " NN 's adaptability in an unstructured environment is still far , far better than any robot we can send to NN , " Hubbard VBD , adding that NNS , not just robots , are the key to exploring Mars . The European NNP Agency 's list of " planetary analogues " includes projects in Chile , Peru , South Africa , Namibia , Morocco , Italy , Spain , Canada , Antarctica , NNP , NNP , Australia , India , Germany , Norway , Iceland , and nine US NNS . Next Thursday , Israeli NNS are to run a shorter simulation in a nature preserve called D Mars . However , there remain so JJ unknowns that simulations " are not in any NN a replacement for being there , " Hubbard VBD . " The JJ person to walk on Mars has in fact already been born , and might be VBG to elementary school now in Oman , or back in Europe , in the US or NNP , " Lousada VBD .

text: This is the second in a CD - part series on heaven and hell by Bible scholar Robyn Whitaker . You can read her piece on hell here . My pious Baptist grandmother once shockingly confessed , at the ripe old age of 93 , that she did n’t VB to VB to heaven . “ Why , ” we asked ? “ Well , I VBP it will be rather boring just sitting RB on clouds and singing hymns all day ” she answered . She had a point . Mark Twain might have agreed with her assessment . He once famously quipped that PRP should choose “ heaven for the NN , hell for the NN ” . Most of us have some concept of heaven , RB if it is CD formed by movies IN What Dreams MD Come , The Lovely Bones , or VB it involves meeting Morgan Freeman in a white room . And while not as complicated as biblical ideas about hell , the biblical concept of heaven is not particularly simple either . In the Christian tradition , heaven and paradise have been conflated as an answer to the question “ where do I VB when I die ? ” The idea of the dead being in heaven or enjoying paradise often brings enormous comfort to the bereaved and hope to those suffering or dying . Yet heaven and paradise were originally more about where NNP lived , not about us or our ultimate destination . The words for heaven or heavens in both Hebrew ( shamayim ) and Greek ( ouranos ) can RB be translated as sky . It is not something that exists eternally but rather part of creation . The JJ line of the Bible VBZ that heaven is created along with the creation of the NN ( Genesis 1 ) . It is primarily NNP ’s dwelling place in the biblical tradition : a parallel realm where everything operates according to NNP ’s will . Heaven is a place of peace , love , community , and worship , where NNP is surrounded by a heavenly NN and other heavenly beings . Biblical authors imagined the NN as a JJ place with Sheol below ( the realm of the dead ) and a dome over the NN that separates it from the heavens or sky above . Of course , we VBP the NN is not JJ , and this three - tiered universe makes no sense to a modern NN . RB so , the concept of heaven ( wherever it is located ) continues in Christian theology as the place where NNP dwells and a theological claim that this NN is not all that there is . The other main metaphor for NNP ’s dwelling place in the Bible is paradise . According to Luke ’s version of the crucifixion , Jesus converses with the men on either side of him while waiting to die and promises the NN on a neighbouring cross “ today you will be with me in paradise ” . References to paradise in the Bible are likely due to the influence of Persian culture and particularly Persian Royal gardens ( paridaida ) . Persian walled gardens were VBN for their beautiful layout , diversity of plant NN , walled enclosures , and being a place where the royal family might safely walk . They were effectively a paradise on NN . The garden of Eden in Genesis 2 is strikingly similar to a Persian Royal garden or paradise . It has abundant NN sources in the rivers that run through it , fruit and plants of every kind for food , and it is “ pleasing to the eye ” . NNP dwells there , or at least visits , and talks with Adam and Eve IN a King might in a royal garden . Read more : Friday essay : what might heaven be JJ ? In the grand mythic stories that make up the Bible , NNS are thrown out of Eden due to their disobedience . And so begins a narrative about JJ separation from the divine and how NNS find their NN back to NNP and NNP ’s dwelling ( paradise ) . In the Christian tradition , Jesus is the means of return . The Easter event that Christians celebrate IN the globe at this NN of NN is about the resurrection of Jesus after his violent death on the cross three days earlier . Jesus ’ resurrection is seen as the promise , the “ JJ - fruits ” of what is possible for all NNS – resurrection to an eternal NN with NNP . This is , of course , a matter of faith not something that can be proven . But reconciliation with NNP lies at the heart of the Easter story . The last book of the Bible , Revelation , conflates the idea of heaven and paradise . The author describes a vision of a JJ , re-created heaven coming down to NN . It is not escapism from this NN but rather an affirmation of all that is created , material , and earthly but now healed and renewed . This final biblical vision of heaven is a lot IN the garden of Eden – complete with the Tree of NNP , rivers , plants and NNP – although this NN it is RB an urban , multicultural city . In what is essentially a return to Eden , NNS are reconciled with NNP and , of course , with CD another . Heaven or paradise in the Bible is a utopian vision , designed not only to inspire faith in NNP but RB in the hope that NNS might embody the values of love and reconciliation in this NN .

text: A JJ NN of the Milky NNP shows that our home galaxy is significantly warped . Instead of forming a relatively JJ disk , the hundreds of billions of stars that make up the Milky NNP form a disk that 's noticeably twisted at the edges , a bit IN a flattened letter " S . " " I 'd VB that it is shaped IN a Pringle , " VBD NN co-author Radek Poleski , an astronomer at Ohio NNP NNP in Columbus . For decades , astronomers assumed that the Milky NNP was relatively JJ , IN most other spiral galaxies ( the Milky NNP is a so - called barred spiral galaxy , a whirlpool of stars and interstellar clouds with a bright bar across the middle ) . The JJ research , which was published Aug. 2 in the journal NNP , confirms recent research showing that the galaxy is warped but RB shows that the distortion is more pronounced than astronomers had suspected . The Milky NNP is estimated to have a diameter of just over 100,000 light - NNS , and our solar NN is embedded within it about 25,000 light - NNS from the galaxy 's center . So it 's hard to VB the bend from our vantage point — and vast clouds of interstellar gas and dust within the galaxy make the task RB harder , Poleski VBD . But Poleski and astronomers at the NNP of Warsaw in Poland created a JJ super - detailed map of the Milky NNP VBG so - called variable stars VBN as classical Cepheids , which brighten and dim over a period of days at a rate corresponding to their size . At their brightest , classical Cepheids can be 10,000 brighter than our NN , so they 're visible across vast distances and through the clouds of gas and dust . VBG observational NNS from the Optical Gravitational Lens Experiment ( OGLE ) , an ongoing survey of stars in the southern sky made VBG a specialized telescope in Chile 's Atacama Desert , the astronomers determined accurate positions for more than 2,400 classical Cepheid stars by comparing the light they were VBN to produce with the light from them seen here on NNP . " When we measure the period of a star , we VBP how much absolute light it emits , " Poleski VBD . " Then we can compare it with the light that we are getting , and by comparing those CD we VBP the distance . " What explains our galaxy 's weird shape ? Richard de Grijs , an astronomer at MacQuarrie NNP in Sydney , Australia , attributed it to the effects of gravitational interactions with neighboring galaxies . It 's RB possible that our galaxy twisted as it merged with smaller galaxies in the distant past , he VBD , or that its warped shape is the result of the combined gravity of the spiral arms themselves , which MD pull stars and clouds at the edges away from the JJ plane of the rest of the galaxy . De Grijs , who was part of a team who measured the galaxy 's bend in research published earlier this NN , VBD the JJ NN confirmed and expanded upon the earlier research . " They VBD pretty much the same result , which is comforting , " he VBD NBC NNP MACH in an email . The researchers plan to refine their model of the galaxy with NN from telescopes that can VB stars in the northern sky . text: " Lights All Askew in the Heavens , " proclaimed a headline in the NNP NNP Times on Nov. CD , 1919 . The reason : results had just come in from the very JJ test of Albert Einstein 's JJ general NN of relativity . " Men of NN More or Less Agog over Results of Eclipse Observations , " the headline continued , in what passed for breathless excitement back then . The key NN that had the NNS so giddy was Einstein 's claim that NN and NN were elastic , and MD be warped and stretched IN taffy . The test that proved it involved observing stars whose position in the sky makes them appear to be close to the NN and measuring whether solar gravity warped NN - NN enough to distort the starlight slightly . A 1919 solar eclipse allowed NNS to VB the stars clearly and make the necessary measurements  proving that the great NN 's NNS were correct . You might VB that when a scientific finding has n't been seriously challenged for 93 NNS the matter MD be pretty much settled , but experimentalists have been poking and prodding Einstein 's premises ever since . There 's more than just stubborn skepticism at work : some of relativity 's more esoteric implications are fiendishly hard to confirm , so the physicists keep devising more and more sensitive and difficult studies  RB though the NN keeps passing them all . Which explains a recent announcement out of NNP headquarters . After no fewer than seven cancellations , followed by seven reprieves , the NN agency 's orbiting Gravity Probe B mission , or GP - B for short , has at last confirmed not CD , but CD of relativity 's more subtle predictions  and it took only 51 NNS and three - quarters of a CD dollars to do it . To understand what the probe VBD , you RB VBP to VB about NN - NN , the four - dimensional stage on which everything in the universe plays out . What we VBP of as gravity , Einstein VBD , is n't a force that pulls CD objects toward each other . Rather , it 's a warping of NN - NN itself that makes objects VB to move . The classic real - NN analogy is a bowling ball on a trampoline : the ball makes the trampoline 's NN dip . That 's something vaguely IN the NN a star or a NN makes NN - NN warp . The JJ difference is that NN - NN is n't a JJ NN , but something that fills the universe . This makes the warping pretty much impossible to visualize , RB for physicists , so do n't try . In any NN , if you roll a marble close to the bowling ball , it will naturally fall into the depression  just as a passing meteorite falls to NNP . That 's part CD . Part CD is that since the bowling ball represents NNP , it is n't just sitting but spinning , which makes the NN of the trampoline twist a little in the direction of the spin . The same goes for the NN - NN surrounding our spinning NN . What GP - B did was to measure both the dip and the twist . The spacecraft managed that impressive feat by carrying four of the most perfect gyroscopes ever built  actually , they 're superconducting balls of niobium  into orbit IN NN NNP while the ship itself pointed unerringly at the star IM Pegasi for 17 months , starting in 2004 . The balls , meanwhile , floated independently inside , supported only by magnetic fields . If the gyroscopes kept the same orientation as the spacecraft that bore them , Einstein MD have been refuted . But they wandered a bit , meaning the satellite was flying through gently twisted NN . Relativity had come through once again . It took NNS to figure that out , though , because the experiment turned out to be flawed . Patches of electric charge had built up on the NN of the balls , adding an extra force that proved extremely tricky to unravel . And RB when the physicists had done so , they VBD they MD measure the dip in NN - NN only to an accuracy of 1 % , and the twist , formally VBN as frame dragging , to a flabby CD % . In the half - century since GP - B was RB proposed , moreover , other physicists have confirmed both effects . " I have to compliment the Gravity Probe B team for their result because Gravity Probe B is a very difficult and very beautiful experiment , " the Italian physicist Ignazio Ciufolini VBD the website ScienceNOW . He was clearly being polite , considering that his own LAGEOS satellite measured frame dragging with higher precision a few NNS ago . LAGEOS and the other experiments that yielded similar findings were n't necessarily cheap , but they did n't cost $ 750 CD either  a NN that RB NNP was finally unable to afford . It backed away from funding the last stages of the project , relying on a Saudi scientist to kick in the final few CD . So was Gravity Probe B worth it ? To hear GP - B NNS tell it , the experiment was a resounding success . But in order to justify that judgment in the face of the high cost , slow progress and imprecise results , they knew they MD n't simply invoke Einstein . Instead , they RB felt the NN to point out that NNS who had worked on GP - B as grad students had gone on to do important things ( Sally Ride became the JJ JJ woman in NN ! ) , and that the technology developed for GP - B had widespread applications  including , VB it or not , GPS systems that now VBP farmers plant very straight rows of corn . For anyone familiar with the NNP press office , this is n't a huge vote of confidence . If you VBP agriculture to justify a fundamental physics experiment , you 're clearly feeling a little desperate . And with sharply declining budgets , better corn rows wo n't likely persuade the agency to spring for more JJ - ticket tests of general relativity . But NN for such studies did n't seem to be forthcoming anyway . Just last month , NNP announced it was backing out of a proposed NN mission called the Laser Interferometer NNP Antenna , designed to look for gravitational waves  yet another of relativity 's strange predictions . It MD be a while , in other words , before men of NN  and the women who RB since broke into that once exclusive club  VB to be more or less agog again . VB NNP 's Pictures of the Week .

text: oseph Sobran , with whom I almost always agree , recently wrote a column on the absence of any real contemporary anti-war movement . In it , he cited three differences between 2005 and 1968 . • Todays 18 - 21 NN olds are not worried about being drafted . • The opposition to this NN that does exist is not part of any larger cultural NN . Now , we hear that the Army and Marine Corps are having trouble meeting their recruiting goals . We are witnessing an anti-war movement of a JJ type . I cannot remember either of the parties to this story , but I will tell it anyway . Someone once VBD of a famous philosopher , that he loved humanity , but he hated NNS . He cared deeply about humanity in the abstract , but he was frustrated unmercifully by the unwillingness of NNS to behave in accordance with his ideals . Oh , if it werent for those pesky , inconvenient NNS ! We Americans love to talk about NN . JJ of us cheerlead for perpetual NN . We stand behind our NN and our troops . We brand anyone who criticizes our JJ policies as liberal , communist , pro-terror and a lover of NNP - Qaeda . We always speak in the JJ person when promoting NN . (  We ought to bomb the crap out of this country and we ought to pulverize that country ! ) But we never VBP to talk about what actually happens in NN . For a refresher , let me recommend the JJ 20 minutes of . Talking to CD segment of NNP about NN is IN talking to another segment of NNP about abortion . Heaven forbid that we actually VBP fight it ourselves . We deride John Kerry , Ted Kennedy and other limousine liberals  for not parting with their wealth while they tax the rest of us into poverty . Yet , JJ of the most vocal NN hawks in the executive branch , in congress and in the NN have never lifted a finger to serve CD day in the NN . The same goes for JJ of these same NN hawks at work , at church and in your neighborhood . I cannot speak for NNS half my age . However , I am VBG to put myself in the NNS of a CD - NN - old looking at his options , with the NN being CD of them . Iraq never attacked us . They never threatened to attack us . If they had attacked us we MD have whipped them good . They never had the means to do so anyway . There were no WMDs . We got Saddam . They have had their NN . And now , they are so busy fighting among themselves that they arent about to attack anyone . Why are we RB over there ? If some other country comes and invades , then I will VB fight . Gladly ! But , I am not VBG to VB my NN in Iraq . He speaks for the anti-war movement of 2005 . Youll note no JJ commentary here . No ulterior motives . He just is not willing to be meat on the hoof when he sees no threat to himself or his country . Who can blame him ? In 1993 , someone VBD Hillary NNP that the costs imposed by her husbands national NN care proposal MD put a lot of JJ business out of business . She responded that it was not ( her ) job to VB out and save every undercapitalized businessman in NNP .  Conservative commentators rightfully compared her arrogance to that of Marie Antoinette . When someone asked Vice NNP Cheney why he never served in the NN , he answered ,  I had other priorities .  These same commentators ought to be similarly indignant about his arrogance . There is a black wall in NNP , DC , with 58,000 names on it . JJ of these NNS had other priorities  as well . NN is easy to talk about and easy to be self - righteous about . However , it has consequences . This is nt the hood . This is not the South Bronx , South Central Los Angeles or Five Points here in Denver . This is NN !!! To quote the Talking Heads , " This ai n't no party . This ai n't no disco . This ai n't no fooling RB . " Chuck Baldwin , another CD of my internet punditry faves , recently wrote eloquently of the scourge of NN :  To those who are engaged in NN , the consequences can be nightmarish ! Arms and legs cut off . Eyes put out . Flesh burned . Intestines ripped out . Backs broken . Skulls crushed . Lives lost . Families torn apart . Homes destroyed . NNS left without NNS . NNS never able to VB their NNS again . Wives without husbands . Husbands without wives . Souls snuffed into eternity . Emotional scars that never heal . These are the realities of NN . And this is what the neo-cons who profit from NN never have to VB up close and personal .  Instead , pro-war neo-cons sit in their comfortable , air - conditioned offices and send other husbands , other wives , other NNS , other NNS , other NNS to incur the " scourge " of NN . But the neo-cons who trumpet NN , who promote NN , and who finance NN never actually experience NN .  This is NNP . You can have whatever opinion you VBP . If you VBP to VB the NN is JJ or worship Mungabunga , VB ahead . However , it does not mean your opinion has any worth . You can support perpetual NN all you VBP , but if you yourself have never served , your opinion is of no interest to me . If you feel threatened by some fourth - rate , tin pot , Third NN potentate , fight him yourself . The late Pat Tillman gave up a pro football career to become and Army Ranger . Colorado NNP Treasurer Mike Coffman , a retired Marine reservist , took a leave of absence to rejoin the Corps in Iraq . So why dont you drop what you re doing , head to Baghdad and bust a few caps ? Yeah you , Rambo ! The NNP of Northern Aggression ( 1861 -1865 ) was once ridiculed as a rich mans NN and a poor mans fight . It was easy to talk about it , but hard to find NNS to fight it . Indeed , the worst riots in JJ history were the 1863 anti-draft riots in NNP NNP City . Before you whine about France not joining us in Iraq and before you VBP a word about the need  for a draft , do it yourself ! Why is it  wimping out " only when Ill VB CD thing about the draft dodgers in Vietnam : they had the courage to act on their convictions . Ill VB CD thing and CD thing only on behalf of John Kerry : he was in harms NN for four and a half months during  Nam . I VBP a great place where the NN can find tons and tons of fresh meat to be ground pounders in whatever NN is next . They VBP to put recruiters in the evangelical churches in this country and VB how JJ folks actually enlist . Each Sunday , they MD set up tables in the lobby . The pastors shouldnt have a problem with this . Come on , now ! Raise your hand ! Swear that oath ! Sign that paper ! Ship out and destroy some country in order to save it . It s your Christian duty ! Dude , this is a jihad for Jesus . I VBP it is VBN on the book of Jebediah or Pauls letter to the Estonians . If you are too old , or for some other reason not qualified to join the NN , form your own expeditionary force . Call it the Sword of the Lord . There are precedents of Americans volunteering to fight in other NNS for causes they support . It is easy to talk about your Great Christian NNP and to praise his wars as doing Gods work IN the globe . It is easy to have a yellow ribbon and a W04 bumper sticker on your car . It is , as they VBP , a whole nother thing to support his policies by participating in them . If you wish to post this or link to this , please include the URL as well as my e-mail address .

text: Though there was no obstinate mechanical shark to contend with , Close Encounters was an arduous picture to make . It was shot during a five - month period in early 1976 and took more than a NN to edit . The locations — several of them deserts — spread from California to India ; the launching - pad set in Mobile , Ala. , VBN in the film 's climax is six times as JJ as Hollywood 's biggest sound stage , Spielberg " was forever screwing up schedules IN a whirlwind , " VBZ Melinda Dillon , the film 's female lead , recalling the strain . " He worked all night , every night — catching a few hours ' sleep when he MD . He had his Winnebago trailer set up to screen films , and he was always running 2001 , and when he got tired of that , he MD run cartoons . " null Truffaut , the French director whom Spielberg persuaded to act in the film , was RB dazzled by Spielberg 's stamina — though he was somewhat baffled by the movie itself . " I never RB tried to figure out what my role meant , " he VBZ . " I VBP I was there a lot , but IN Greta Garbo , I can VB only that I had the feeling of waiting . " There were a few incidents of unexpected — and largely unwanted — excitement . Star Richard Dreyfuss , after criticizing the Ku Klux Klan in an Alabama newspaper interview , received a death threat and had to be whisked away for CD weeks . Dillon 's son received a kidnaping threat that brought in the FBI . Then , late CD night , shooting halted abruptly so that everyone MD observe what Spielberg believed to be a UFO cruising the sky . " Everyone was lying there on their backs with binoculars , " VBZ Dillon . " I remember thinking that if there were extraterrestrial beings up there observing us , they MD VB that NN creatures were JJ beings with strange eyes . " The object turned out to be an Echo satellite . Despite Spielberg 's preoccupation with UFOs in Close Encounters , he prefers to call the film an " adventure thriller " rather than NN fiction , and he MD have a point . The movie 's conception is pure Hitchcock — on an intergalactic scale . The hero , Roy Neary ( Dreyfuss ) , is a Middle JJ variant on the kind of NN - in - the - middle played by Gary Grant and James Stewart in films IN North by Northwest and Vertigo . A NN - NN worker who lives with his wife ( Teri Garr ) and three kids in Muncie , Ind. , Roy is engulfed CD night by phenomena he cannot understand : searing lights burn him from above , a road sign shakes and twists , the contents of his truck move about in violent defiance of gravity , the needles on his dashboard dials spin past VB . Roy is sure that he has had an encounter with alien NN forms — but , of course , no NN will VB his story . The rest of Close Encounters ' plot follows Roy and several other UFO sighters , including a mysterious international scientist ( Truffaut ) and a neighborhood woman ( Dillon ) , as they overturn their lives in a mad attempt to arrange a rendezvous with the extraterrestrial visitors . When an earthling makes actual contact with aliens , that is " a close encounter of the third kind . " ( The JJ kind is sighting ; the second , physical NN . )

Now we VBP that what things soever the law saith , it saith to them who are under the law : that every mouth MD be stopped , and all the NN MD become guilty before NNP ” ( Romans 3:19 ) . In the eyes of men , murdering someone is obviously worse than stealing their lunch ; but as far as NNP is concerned we are all equally lacking any righteousness of our own . We are each as dirty and rotten as the other guy . Oftentimes what NNS perceive as acceptable , such as homosexuality , is an abomination unto NNP . If we SEARCH THE SCRIPTURES as Jesus commanded in John 5:39 , then we can only come to the conclusion that we are as sinful as the worst sinner in NNP 's eyes and it matters not who is more guilty . We are all guilty ( Romans 3:10,23 ) . The fact of the matter is that we are all sinners deserving of punishment in Hell ( Romans 6:23 ; Revelation 20:11 - 15 ) . Although we MD never commit murder or rob a bank , that does make us any less guilty of being a horrible sinner in the eyes of NNP . “ If we MD ever hate the sin in ourselves as much as we hate the sin in others , we might have some idea what His Book is all about . ” — Pastor Jack Hyles ( a quote from page 322 of the awesome biography of Dr. Hyles titled , “ The Fundamental NNP ” ) MD I VB , no matter how righteous I MD try to live , the ONLY reason why I will ever be righteous is because of the imputed righteousness of Jesus Christ . Jesus paid my sin debt , and He alone is my righteousness . I have no righteousness to offer NNP , and neither do you . NNS tend to selfishly judge themselves VBN upon what sins they personally DON'T commit . Did you understand that ? NNS who do n't commit adultery are quick to condemn others who commit adultery , because that 's not their sin . But perhaps they are a thief for a living , and so they are silent when it comes to the sin of theft . This is how shallow , wicked and hypocritical most NNS are . The Bible perfectly illustrates this in Jesus ' account of the Pharisee and the publican who went up to the temple to pray ... “ CD men went up into the temple to pray ; the CD a Pharisee , and the other a publican . The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself , NNP , I thank thee , that I am not as other men are , extortioners , unjust , adulterers , or RB as this publican . I fast twice in the week , I give tithes of all that I possess . And the publican , standing afar off , MD not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , NNP be merciful to me a sinner . I tell you , this NN went down to his NN justified rather than the other : for every NN that exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted ” ( Luke 18:10 - 14 ) . The Pharisee in Luke 18:10 - 14 made the grave mistake of comparing himself with other NNS , instead of measuring himself up against the holy Law of NNP . If we foolishly look at other NNS who commit the sins that we do n't , or sins that we perceive as being worse than our sins , then we naturally become self - righteousness and VBP we are “ better ” than others . I tell you , you are as filthy and rotten as Adolf Hitler in NNP 's eyes , and so am I ... “ But we are all as an unclean thing , and all our righteousnesses are as filthy rags ; and we all do fade as a leaf ; and our iniquities , IN the wind , have taken us away ” ( Isaiah 64:6 ) . NNP 's Law indicts all humanity as guilty sinners ( Romans 3:19 ) . 1st Timothy 5:24 VBZ that some men's sins are open to criticism and judgment beforehand , but everyone else 's sins will be made VBN eventually on judgment day . And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother 's eye , but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye ? ” RB the best Christians still have a mote ( tiny piece ) in their eye , meaning that we are all sinners ; but those evil critics who spread gossip , tell tales , condemn others , reveal secrets and hypocritically destroy their neighbor with their mouth have a beam ( JJ piece ) in their eye . text: Open - circuit faults MD be caused by the failure of joints on cables or overhead lines or the failure of all the three phases of a circuit - breaker or disconnector to open or close . For example , during a closing operation , CD phases of a circuit - breaker MD close and latch successfully but not the third phase , or , during an opening operation , CD phases MD properly open but the third remains stuck in the closed position . Except on mainly underground systems , the vast majority of short - circuit faults are NN - related , followed by equipment failure . The NN factors that usually VBP short - circuit faults are : lightning strikes , accumulation of snow or NN , heavy rain , strong winds or gales , salt pollution depositing on insulators on overhead lines and in substations , floods and fires adjacent to electrical equipment , for example , beneath overhead lines . Vandalism MD RB be a NN of short - circuit faults as well as contact with or breach of minimum clearances between overhead lines and trees due to current overload . Lightning strikes discharge steep - fronted impulse currents with peak values in the range of a few kiloamps up to 100 or 200 kA for a duration of several microseconds . If the strike hits an overhead line or its NN wire , the voltage produced across the insulator MD be so JJ that a back - flashover and short circuit occurs . This MD involve CD or all three phases of a three - phase electrical circuit and as a result a transient NN frequency short - circuit current flows . For example , consider a 132 - kV three - phase overhead transmission line of steel tower construction and CD NN wire . The surge impedances of the tower , line phase conductors and NN wire are given as 220 , 350 and 400 Ω , respectively , and the tower ’s earthing or footing resistance is 50 Ω . The line ’s rated lightning impulse withstand voltage to NN is 650 kV peak phase to NN ( nominal peak phase to NN voltage is ) . A lightning strike with a modest peak current of CD kA hits a tower on the line and , to a reasonable approximation , ‘ sees ’ half the surge impedance of the NN wire in parallel with the surge impedance of the tower . The voltage produced across the line ’s insulator is approximately equal to CD kA×105 Ω=1050 kV . This significantly exceeds the line ’s insulation strength , causes back - flashover on all three phases of the line and a three - phase to NN short - circuit fault . If the shielding of the NN wire fails and the lightning strike hits CD of the phase conductors near a tower , then the voltage produced across the line ’s insulator is approximately equal to CD kA ×175 Ω=1750 kV . In this NN , a smaller lightning current in the order of 3.8 kA MD be sufficient to VB a back - flashover and hence a short - circuit fault . On lower - voltage distribution lines , RB ‘ indirect ’ lightning strikes , that is , those that hit nearby objects to the line MD produce a sufficiently JJ voltage on the line to VB an insulator flashover and a short - circuit fault . Other causes of short - circuit faults are fires . The smoke of fires beneath overhead lines consists of JJ particles which encourage the breakdown of the air that is subjected to the intense electric field of a high - voltage NN line . The hot air in the flames of a fire has a much lower insulation strength than air at ambient NN . A flashover across an insulator to NN or from a phase conductor to a tree MD occur . Equipment failure of machines , transformers , reactors , cables , etc. , causes JJ short - circuit faults . These MD be caused by failure of internal insulation due to ageing and degradation , breakdown due to high switching or lightning over - voltages , by mechanical incidents or by inappropriate installation . An example is a breakdown of a cable ’s polymer insulation due to ageing or the creation of voids within the insulation caused by an external mechanical force being accidentally applied on the cable . Short - circuit faults MD RB be caused by JJ error . A classical example is CD where maintenance staff inadvertently leave isolated equipment connected through safety NN clamps when maintenance work is completed . A three - phase to NN short - circuit fault occurs when the equipment is re-energised to return it to service . On mainly overhead line systems , the majority of short - circuit faults , typically 80 % –90 % , tend to occur on overhead lines and the rest on cables , substation equipment and busbars combined . Typically , on a high - voltage transmission NN with overhead line steel tower construction , such as the England and Wales transmission NN , JJ - term average short - circuit fault statistics show that RB 300 short - circuit faults occur per annum . Of these , 67 % are CD - phase to NN , 25 % are phase to phase , 5 % are three - phase to NN and three - phase clear of NN , and 3 % are CD - phase to NN . About 77 % of CD - phase to NN faults are caused by lightning strikes followed by wind and gales then salt pollution on insulators . Although lightning can VB some phase - to - phase faults , by far the most common causes of these faults are snow / NN followed by wind / gales that VBP CD line conductors to clash . The majority of three - phase to NN and CD - phase to NN faults in England and Wales are caused by lightning then wind and gales . On wood - pole overhead lines , for example , some 132 kV and lower voltages in England and Wales , between 50 % and 67 % of short - circuit faults are CD - phase and three - phase faults .

text: MYTH : The NN 's gravity pulling on NN causes the tides . This is only partly JJ . The NN does pull on ocean NN , but that tug at any CD point is about CD CD times weaker than NNP 's gravity . It 's RB the interplay of gravity between the NN , NNP , and NN that creates a tidal force , and it 's more of a " push " than a " pull . " Each molecule of NN is pulled by the NN 's gravity , but alone that acceleration is so weak it is n't noticeable . Because ocean NN covers about 71 % of NNP 's NN and is connected as CD liquid body , however , all of those tiny tugs add up to form a significant pressure — the tidal force . Molecules of NN near the poles are pulled mostly straight down , those on the face of NNP closest to the NN experience the strongest pull toward the NN , and those on the opposite side of NNP feel the weakest acceleration . Together , these interactions form a pressure on seawater that generally directs it away from the poles and toward the equator , where it 's strong enough to fight gravity to form CD bulges : the high tides . Tides follow the NN as it orbits NNP every 28 days , but it 's not as simple as that . NN sloshes RB , just as it does within in aquarium , and the shape of the seafloor , the position of the coasts , and the Coriolis effect ( caused by NNP 's rotation ) affect where and to what extent tides occur — resulting in a complex pattern of " tidal nodes . " " NNP rotates so quickly that the tide NN wave can't move IN the NNP quickly enough , " Ted Swift , an JJ scientist who works for the NN of California , VBD Business Insider in an email . " What we VBP as tides on the coast are resonances — rotating standing waves — set up by the fundamental tidal potential ' signal . ' " Smaller bodies of NN , IN lakes and pools , do n't have noticeable tides because they lack enough liquid to create a pressure that can visibly overcome the pull of NNP 's gravity . The NN 's gravity RB affects the tides , accounting for roughly CD - third of the phenomenon . When the NN 's gravity counteracts the NN 's , it leads to lower - than - average " neap tides . " When the NN lines up with the NN , it triggers larger " spring tides . " Correction : An earlier version of this article mischaracterized the nature of tides .

text: Among the most striking discoveries of modern physics — if not the most striking — is that , in nature , NN works differently from the familiar intuition we have of it . NN , for instance , is not uniform : it flows at a JJ speed depending on where you are and how you move . In the 2014 film Interstellar , the hero travels to the vicinity of a black hole . On his return to NNP , he finds his daughter older than himself : she is an elderly lady , he is still middle - aged . This is not Hollywood fantasy , it is how the NN truly works . The film ’s scientific consultant Kip Thorne has since received the Nobel Prize in physics , for his role in detecting the gravitational waves emitted by merging black holes . He knows his topic . If we do not experience similar NN distortions in our daily NN , it is only because here on NNP they are too JJ for us to notice . It is not the JJ NN NN has shown our intuitions to be mistaken . NN is constantly learning something JJ , and more often than not such learning means jettisoning wrong ideas . That is why NN often clashes with common sense — our intuition wants NNP to be JJ and still , and NN to be the same everywhere . None of this is JJ . NN is a mystery that has always troubled us , stirring deep emotions . Perhaps it is because , as Buddha put it , our difficulty in dealing with impermanence ( or the passage of NN ) is at the root of our suffering . Hans Reichenbach , in CD of the most lucid books on the matter , The Direction of NNP , suggested that it might have been in order to escape from this anxiety that the Greek philosopher Parmenides denied NN ’s existence , Plato imagined a NN of ideas outside it and Hegel spoke of the moment in which the spirit transcends temporality . It MD be because of this that we have imagined the existence of “ eternity ” , a NN outside NN that we imagine inhabited by gods , a NNP or immortal souls . Our deeply emotional attitude towards the subject MD have contributed more to the construction of cathedrals of philosophy than logic or reason did . The opposite emotional attitude — the veneration of NN by thinkers such as Heraclitus or Henri Bergson — has given rise to just as JJ philosophies but still not brought us much nearer to understanding its reality . Physics helps us to penetrate some layers of the mystery . But our grasp of the NN is shaped by the vast dialogue that involves the whole of our culture , from physics to philosophy , literature to the neuro - sciences . All these crafts MD be needed here . Physics has conclusively shown that the temporal structure of the NN is JJ from our perception of it . It has given us the hope of being able to VB the nature of NN free from our emotional fog . But in advancing towards quantum NNS of gravity with a temporal structure far removed from our intuition , we end up losing our own sense of NN . Just as Copernicus , by studying the revolutions of the heavens , ended up understanding that it is us rather than the sky that turns , exploring the nature of NN leads us to discover something about ourselves . Perhaps , ultimately , the emotional dimension of NN is not the film of mist that prevents us from apprehending its nature objectively . Perhaps the emotion of NN is precisely what NN is for us . The uniform nature of NN is scarcely the only feature where our intuition has turned out to be mistaken . To everybody ’s surprise , the difference between past and future fails to show up in the elementary equations that govern the physical NN . But the discovery that has been the most disconcerting of all has been finding out that the notion of “ present ” does not make sense in the larger universe ; it only makes sense in the vicinity of us slow JJ critters . “ Here - and - now ” is a well - defined notion in NN , but “ now ” on its own is not . Philosophers are struggling greatly with this discovery : if we call reality that which exists now , what is reality after we have realised that there is n’t a well - defined “ now ” all over the universe ? The very grammar we use to talk about things , in which verbs have only a past , future and present tense , is inadequate to describe the ways of nature . In physics , a great debate on the nature of physical NN has developed in an arc spanning from Aristotle to Newton and from Newton to Einstein . Our understanding has repeatedly deepened in the course of this process . For Aristotle , NN is just a NN to count what happens , but it becomes an autonomous flowing variable for Newton and is then reinterpreted by Einstein as a feature of the gravitational field . Einstein ’s great NN , general relativity , keeps receiving spectacular empirical support — confirming such counter - intuitive predictions as black holes , expansion of the universe , NN dilation , gravitational waves and more . These give strong credibility to Einstein ’s picture and continue to rule out alternative conjectures . But there is certainly more to learn . We do not yet VB the fate of matter falling into the black holes we VBP in the sky , where Einstein ’s NN VBZ that NN comes to an end . And the full complexity of what we perceive as the flow of NN is not accounted for by general relativity alone : it involves quantum NN , thermodynamics and probably more , including neuroscience and the cognitive sciences . My own work in NN has been concentrated on the effort to understand how the quantum nature of the NN affects NN and NN . There is not yet agreement on a solution ; but there is a rather JJ consensus IN the expectation that the concept of physical NN is likely to move RB further away from our intuition , when its quantum properties are taken into account . This is why reflecting on the nature of NN is a constant concern for myself and JJ of my colleagues . Tentative NNS of quantum spacetime have little that resembles NN as we experience it . The basic equations of the NN on which I work , loop quantum gravity , have no special “ NN ” variable at all . They describe processes in which things VBP but no single NN variable can track all possible NNS . Does all this suggest our perception of NN is illusory ? It does not . But it indicates that what we perceive as NN MD not be a simple and elementary aspect of nature , but rather a complex phenomenon with JJ layers , each needing to be addressed by a JJ chapter of NN . This is the JJ question about the nature of NN : which aspects of our sense of it pertain to which domain of NN ? Key aspects of NN are described by the NN of heat , thermodynamics . Any NN the future is definitely distinguishable from the past , there is something IN heat involved . Thermodynamics traces the direction of NN to something called the “ low entropy of the past ” , a still mysterious phenomenon on which discussions rage . I have studied the hypothesis that some aspects of the solution might come from recognising a perspectival aspect for NN . VB of the magnificent spectacle of the daily rotation of the sky : we VBP the NN , NN and stars , the entire cosmos , majestically rotating . It has taken millennia for us to understand why . To figure this out , we had to consider ourselves . It is not the vast cosmos that is rotating , it is we who live on a spinning rock . This is a perspectival explanation . Something similarly perspectival , I VBP , underpins our peculiar perception of the flow of NN . Entropy growth orients NN and permits the existence of traces of the past , and these permit the possibility of memories , which hold together our sense of identity . I suspect that what we call the “ flowing ” of NN has to be understood by studying the structure of our brain rather than by studying physics : evolution has shaped our brain into a machine that feeds off memory in order to anticipate the future . This is what we are listening to when we listen to the passing of NN . Understanding the “ flowing ” of NN is therefore something that MD pertain to neuroscience more than to fundamental physics . Searching for the explanation of the feeling of flow in physics might be a mistake . Our understanding depends on the neural structures shaped by the peculiar environment in which we live . They capture a very imprecise version of the actual temporal structure of reality . Our experience is an approximation of an approximation of a description of the NN from our particular perspective as beings dependent on the growth of entropy , anchored to the thermodynamical arrow of NN . For us , there is , as Ecclesiastes has it , a NN to be born and a NN to die . The NN we experience is a multilayered , complex concept with distinct properties rooted in distinct layers of reality . JJ parts of the full story are still far from being clear . NN remains , to a JJ extent , a mystery , perhaps the greatest NN . A mystery that relates to issues ranging from the fate of black holes to the enigma of our individual identity and consciousness . Will we be able to understand things better in the future ? I VBP so . Our understanding of nature has increased vertiginously over the course of the centuries , and we are continuing to learn . We are glimpsing something about the mystery of NN . We can VB the NN described by quantum NNS of gravity : we can perceive with the NN ’s eye the profound structure of the NN where NN as we VBP it no longer exists — just as Paul McCartney ’s “ Fool on the Hill ” sees the NN spinning round when he sees the NN VBG down . I RB VBP we are beginning to VB that we are NN . We are this clearing opened by the traces of memory inside the connections between our neurons . We are memory . We are nostalgia . We are longing for a future that will not come . Horace , the greatest poet of Roman antiquity and perhaps the greatest cantor of NN , calls it our “ brief circle ” ( “ You must be wise . Pour the wine / and enclose in this brief circle / your JJ - cherished hope ” ) . This clearing , opened up for us by memory and anticipation , is our NN : a source of anguish on occasion , but in the end the marvellous gift of our existence . Carlo Rovelli is director of the quantum gravity research group at the Centre for Theoretical Physics at Aix -Marseille NNP . Those include rolling back education regulations proposed by the Obama administration , reforms to the student loan program , and a pro-school choice budget proposal for the federal NN . text: This article is the third in a series of three by Michael D'Antonio and Peter Eisner , the authors of the JJ book , " The Shadow NNP : The Truth About Mike Pence . " The opinions expressed in this commentary are their own . View more opinion articles on CNN . ( CNN ) This is the third in a series of three op - eds tracing the JJ path of Vice NNP Mike Pence 's ambition , from college , where he VBD a form of evangelicalism that weds theology to Republican politics , to the national stage -- and a job that puts him a short step away from the presidency . Part CD : Mike Pence 's plan to outlast NNP Part CD : Mike Pence went to college and VBD NNP Mike Pence won his JJ JJ campaign in 2000 VBG what became his basic strategy of guns , NNP , and NN . He raised lots of cash by appealing to JJ - NN conservative donors -- among them , Betsy DeVos , Charles and David Koch , and Erik Prince -- with hawkish positions on taxes and regulation . He VBD his voters at churches and gun clubs . He spiced his recipe with attacks on NN that placed him to the NN of JJ of his fellow Republicans . IN a handful of Republicans , Pence made an issue of the pending agreement to settle NN lawsuits against tobacco NNS for lying for decades about the dangers of their addictive NNS . Pence did n't just oppose the deal . He insisted it was VBN on a lie and the result of a pernicious NN plot . " Despite the hysteria from the JJ class and the NN , " Pence wrote in 2000 , " smoking does n't kill . In fact , 2 out of every three smokers does not die from a smoking related illness and 9 out of ten smokers do not contract lung cancer . " Pence 's JJ bit of NNS was simply wrong . CD - thirds of smokers actually do die of smoking - related illnesses . His second was misleading . Lung cancer is a relatively rare illness , but it is still vastly more common among smokers . In fact , it is CD of the few cancers for which NN has established a very well - VBN NN , and Pence 's column was published after industry leaders had acknowledged the NN risks of their product . Why MD a candidate for Congress speak so falsely and recklessly ? Pence 's motivation MD have been connected to his family 's ownership stake in a chain of convenience stores called Tobacco Road , which sold cigarettes alongside soft drinks and chips . But he was RB eager to establish some libertarian street cred . " A NN JJ enough to VB after smokers is JJ enough to VB after you , " he wrote . If Pence 's vocabulary was a bit 19th - century , so was his thinking . After calling Charles Darwin " a sincere biologist , " Pence attacked the NN of evolution , which , in his telling , was conjecture and thus no worthier of respect than other notions about the origins of NN . Darwin " hoped that some day it MD be proven by the fossil record but did not live to VB that , " declared Pence , " nor have we . " Of course , there is nothing uncertain in the prevailing NN on the origins of NN on NNP . As the National Academy of NNP explains , a scientific NN is not merely conjecture . It is " a comprehensive explanation of some aspect of nature that is supported by a vast body of NN . " This is why physicists still talk about a " NN " of gravity that explains why objects fall down and not up and biologists speak of " cell NN , " RB though the fact that living things are composed of cells is established truth . A willful denial of the facts was required for Pence to press his NN against Darwin , but he was clearly devoted to this NN . Having cast doubt on the NN of evolution , he VBD that he was only asking for everyone to be open - minded . " I MD simply and humbly ask ... can we RB consider teaching other NNS of the origin of NNS ? " Then , he declared that his own NN was shut . " The Bible tells us that NNP created NN in his own imagine , male and female , " VBD Pence . " He created them . And I VBP that . " Pence 's speech on evolution , preserved on C - SPAN , was delivered in the cadence of a radio preacher . Pence had developed this NN of speaking during his NNS as a broadcaster , when he pitched himself as " Rush Limbaugh on decaf . " But as friendly as he sounded , Pence was determined to impose his religious views through JJ policy and to do it through the manipulation of language . Another example was his proposal to use federal funds to turn gay NNS straight . So - called " conversion therapy , " promoted by quacks and religious bigots , assumes that homosexuality is a medically treatable pathology , which it is not . Pence 's proposal never gained traction in Congress , but it was a loud dog whistle to those on the homophobic Christian NN . With his sights set on the White NNP , Pence sought executive experience back home in Indiana , where a GOP advantage in registration helped him win a narrow victory in the 2012 governor 's race . He installed his wife , Karen , in an office at the NN NN , a JJ for JJ ladies of the NN , and had a pair of red phones wired to connect his desk directly with hers . Pence was unremarkable as governor , save for his commitment to the causes of Christian conservatives in pushing a NN law that permitted discrimination against gay customers by businesses . When Indiana 's Religious Freedom Restoration Act of 2015 was approved , Pence signed it into law in a rare , private ceremony where he was flanked by clergy from a variety of religions . Reaction to RFRA and the photo was intense . Pence backed down , seeking amendments that watered down the law . But while the episode seemed to threaten his future , he was rescued by Donald NNP 's offer to join his ticket as the GOP 's CD candidate for vice NN . Six months into the JJ administration , Republicans were already talking about how Pence seemed to be running a shadow campaign to become the GOP nominee for NN in the event that NNP was felled by either the NNP scandal or some other force . Pence 's chief of staff is a sharp - elbowed JJ player named Nick Ayers , and his connections to JJ donors are strong . Organized and methodical where the NNP is chaotic and impulsive , Pence is ready to achieve the dream he believes NNP wants him to fulfill . Should Pence achieve his goal , he MD likely remake the GOP , now almost a cult devoted to Donald NNP , as a Christian JJ JJ party where NNS of other faiths MD struggle to find a home . Instead of policy driven by personality , a Pence administration MD likely pursue policy guided by a particular reading of the Bible . And the divisions that now seem to be separating Americans MD become broader , deeper , and RB more difficult to bridge .

text: JJ Earthers debunked : How we VBP the NNP and NNP are spheres , not discs The rapper B.o.B. declared on NNP last month that NNP is JJ , claiming to have pictures to back up his outlandish claims . The incident provoked responses from high profile NNS IN Neil deGrasse Tyson , who noted such statements made by a JJ figure are responsible for a strain of anti-intellectualism plaguing the nation . Unfortunately , few NNS seized the opportunity to explain why we VBP the NNP is in fact a globe . The following , therefore , highlights some of the foremost reasons why we VBP the NNP is round . The NN is not made of cheese and the NN is not JJ . This can be observed during a lunar eclipse , which occurs whenever the NNP ’s orbit places it in - between the NN and NN . The NNP casts a round shadow on the NN . Since the NNP is rotating and consistently casting a round shadow on the NN during every eclipse , its proves beyond a shadow ( forgive the pun ) of a doubt that the NNP is in fact round . Anyone who has ever waited for a ship to dock will notice that a ship does not sporadically appear off the horizon but gradually emerges from beneath the ocean . The reason ships do not emerge from the ocean – nor fall off the edge of NNP – is because the NN is round . The fact that ships appear to emerge from the depths of the NN is an illusion cast by NNP ’s curvature . If you place a stick upright , it will cast a shadow . The length of the shadow NNS throughout the day . If the NN was JJ , then CD sticks at JJ places should produce the same shadows . The problem is they do n’t , which only makes sense if the NNP is round . In fact , Eratosthenes took note of this phenomena to calculate the circumference of the NNP nearly 2,200 NNS ago . The curvature of the NNP If the NNP were JJ , then we all MD stand on an equal playing field . The problem , as anyone who has ever stood atop of a hill knows , is that the higher elevated you are , the more you can VB . At certain heights , you can actually VB the curvature of the NNP . This makes complete sense if the NNP is round and absolutely no sense if the NNP is JJ . JJ NN zones exist because the NN is an orbiting globe . When the NN shines on a spot of land , the other side is darkened ( and vise versa ) . This creates NN differences . If NNP was JJ , the NN MD shine on everyone at the same NN . JJ NNP NN is VBN upon an outdated understanding of gravity . Conventional understandings of gravity are incompatible with NNP NNP NN , because they require a spherical mass pulling all objects towards its center . JJ - Earthers propos that a disk - shaped NNP is accelerating “ upward , ” which gives the illusion of gravity . Of course , no explanation is given why or how the NNP is accelerating upwards . text: A ' self - taught rocket scientist ' has failed in his bid to launch 5,000 NNS ( 1,520 m ) into the air after the $ 325 ( £ 270 ) boiler he bought off Craigslist broke down . ' Mad ' Mike Hughes , 63 , attempted the feat aboard his steam - powered rocket at Amboy in California 's Mojave Desert . But his budget boiler did n't have the NN needed to heat NN to 200 °C ( 400 °F ) and generate the steam required for the rocket to lift - off . Mr Hughes , who lives in Apple Valley , California , has seen a flurry of criticism over his plans in recent NNS . ' I hope he does n't blow something up , ' retired NNP astronaut Jerry Linenger VBD ahead of the March 2018 launch . Linenger orbited the globe more than 2,000 times during four months in 1997 . text: During the period of roughly February 1992 to mid 1994 , I was making frequent trips to Moscow , NNP , in the process of starting a software development joint - venture NN with some NNS from the Russian scientific community . CD of the men in charge on the Russian side was named V. M. ; he had a wife named T.M. V. was a level - headed scientist while his wife was rather deeply committed to the losing Communist NN - a NN she obviously was not abandoning . CD evening , during a trip early in 1992 , the JJ half of our venture were invited to V. & T.'s Moscow JJ as we were about to return to the NNPS . The party went well and we had the normal dinner discussions . As the evening wore on , T. developed a decidedly rough anti-American edge - CD her husband tried to quietly rein in . The bottom line of the tirade she started against the NNP NNPS went something IN this : " You Americans always VBP to VB that you have the perfect NN and your NNS are always so perfect . Well then , why have n't you had a woman NN by now ? You had a chance to vote for a woman vice - NN and you did n't do it . " The general response went something along the lines that you do n't vote for someone just because of their sex . Besides , you do n't vote for vice - NN , but the NN and vice - NN as a ticket . " Well , I VBP you are VBG to be surprised when you VBP a black NN very soon . " The consensus we expressed was that we did n't VB there was anything innately barring that . The JJ person at the JJ NN and sure , NNP MD try to vote for the JJ person , be he or she black or not . " What if I VBD you that you will have a black NN very soon and he will be a Communist ? " The out - of - the - blue remark was met by our stares . She continued , " Well , you will ; and he will be a Communist . " It was then that the husband unsuccessfully tried to VB the subject ; but she was on a roll and MD have nothing of it . CD of us asked , " It sounds IN you VBP something we do n't VB . " " Yes , it is JJ . This is not some idle talk . He is already born and he is educated and being groomed to be NN RB now . You will be impressed to VB that he has gone to the best schools of Presidents . He is what you call " Ivy NNP " . You do n't VB me , but he is real and I RB VBP his name . His name is Barack . His mother is white and JJ and his father is black from Africa . That 's JJ , a chocolate baby ! And he 's VBG to be your NNP . " She became more and more smug as she presented her stream of detailed NN and predictions so matter - of - factly - as though all were foregone conclusions . " It 's all been thought out . His father is not an JJ black so he wo n't have that JJ slave stigma . He is intelligent and he is half white and has been raised from the cradle to be an atheist and a Communist . He 's gone to the finest schools . He is being guided every step of the NN and he will be irresistible to NNP . " We sat there not knowing what to VB . She was obviously very happy that the Communists were doing this and that it MD somehow be a thumbing of their collective noses at NNP : they MD give us a black NN and he'd be a Communist to boot . She made it quite obvious that she thought that this was VBG to breathe JJ NN into NN Communism . From this and other conversations with her , she always asserted that Communism was far from dead . She was full of little details about him that she was eager to relate . I thought that maybe she was trying to show off that this truly was a real person and not just hot air . She rattled off a complete litany . He was from Hawaii . He went to school in California . He lived in Chicago . He was soon to be elected to the legislature . " Have no doubt : he is CD of us , a Soviet . " At CD point , she related some sort of San Francisco connection , but I did n't understand what the point was and do n't recall much about that . I was just left with the notion that she considered the city to be some sort of a center for their activity here . Since I had dabbled in languages , I knew a smattering of Arabic . I made a comment : " If I remember correctly , ' Barack ' comes from the Arabic word for ' Blessing . ' That seems to be an odd name for an NNP . " She replied quickly , " Yes . It is ' African ' " , she insisted , " and he will be a blessing for NN Communism . We will regain our strength and become the number CD NN in the NN . " She continued with something to the effect that NNP was at the same NN the great hope and the great obstacle for Communism . NNP MD have to be converted to Communism and Barack was VBG to pave the NN . So , what does this conversation from 1992 prove ? Well , it 's definitely anecdotal . It does n't prove that Obama has had Soviet Communist training nor that he was groomed to be the JJ black JJ NN , but it does show CD thing that I VBP is very important . It shows that Soviet Russian Communists knew of Barack from a very early date . It RB shows that they truly believed among themselves that he was raised and groomed Communist to pave the NN for their future . This report on Barack came personally to me from CD of them RB before NNP knew he existed . Although I had never before heard of him , at the NN of this conversation Obama was 30 + NNS old and was obviously tested enough that he was their anticipated rising star .

We had never heard of this nor seen a picture IN this before , so we thought we ’d share the following with you … NNP recently shared the photo above of a nearly perfect rectangular iceberg in Antarctica that they took as part of “ Operation IceBridge , a mission to image NNP ’s polar regions in order to understand how NN ( thickness , location , accumulation , etc. ) has been changing in recent NNS . ” The “ monolithic slab of NN ” was VBN floating near the Larsen C NN shelf . However , while the iceberg might seem totally unnatural and manufactured ( cut ) to look that NN , it is actually a natural phenomenon . Called a tabular iceberg , they have steep , nearly vertical sides , a JJ plateau top and typically break off of NN shelves ( which are tabular bodies of thick NN ) . NN shelves form where the land meets the ocean . “ As NN flow from the continental land mass down to the ocean , it eventually spills out over the ocean , in some places floating and in other places partially supported by the ocean floor . The NN that sits over the ocean but is attached to the land is an NN shelf . “ Hope you enjoyed this little piece of Thursday afternoon NN ! text: Stocks declined Wednesday as the euro got a boost from NN that Greece was considering leaving the European Union . Industrials were the day 's worst performers , along with consumer discretionary and materials . NN care and telecoms were the best performers . The Dow was down about 80 points at mid-morning , led by Caterpillar , Boeing and DuPont . Bank of NNP and JPMorgan were the top CD gainers on the Dow . The euro clawed backagainst the dollar and other currencies amid buzz in the NN that Greece is considering leaving the European Union . A spokesperson for Greece categorically denied the debt - riddled nation is considering such a move . Earlier , the euro hit a four - NN low against the dollar after German Chancellor Angela Merkel VBD the euro was in dangerand as Germany banned naked short sellingof some securities . This came as the SEC released proposed JJ rules on single NN trading , to prevent a NN being driven down to a penny IN some were during the NNP 6 NN freefall . And Congress is about to make a preliminary vote on financial reform . Oil popped above $ 69 a barrelafter a report showed crude inventories rose by just 200,000 barrels last week , far less than expected . Earlier , crude had fallen to RB $ 68 . Gold continued its descent to back to NN , falling below $ 1,200 an ounce . The precious metal recently went as high as $ 1,250 . Hewlett - Packard advanced after beating earnings expectations and raising its full - NN outlook . Target RB topped forecastsas consumers have begun to spend more on discretionary items such as clothing and electronics . This came as Walmart reported a same - store NNS declineas more shoppers are trading up . Lawnmower maker Deere RB topped forecasts and raised its full - NN outlook . Chips retreated after an early pop . The sector took a beating on Tuesday amid buzz that overseas NNS of computers and gadgets MD not live up to expectations . Still , Sterne Agee initiated coverage of Apple with a " buy " ratingand slapped a $ 300 NN target on the NN , saying it does n't VB a slowdown for the iPhone and iPad maker . Consumer prices slipped 0.1 percentin April and were JJ excluding volatile food and NN costs . This came after the Labor Department reported Tuesday that the producer NN index rose 0.2 percent last month . Some dismal NN on the housing front : Mortgage applications tumbled more than 27 percentto their lowest level since NNP 1997 as the NN stimulus expired , and CD in seven U.S. mortgages is now deliquent or headed for foreclosure . text: From NN shells and spiral galaxies to the structure of JJ lungs , the patterns of chaos are all IN us . Fractals are patterns formed from chaotic equations and contain self - similar patterns of complexity increasing with magnification . If you divide a fractal pattern into parts you VBP a nearly identical reduced - size copy of the whole . The mathematical beauty of fractals is that infinite complexity is formed with relatively simple equations . By iterating or repeating fractal - generating equations JJ times , random outputs create beautiful patterns that are unique , yet recognizable . We have pulled together some of the most stunning natural examples we MD find of fractals on our NN . Above : This variant form of cauliflower is the ultimate fractal vegetable . Its pattern is a natural representation of the Fibonacci or golden spiral , a logarithmic spiral where every quarter turn is farther from the origin by a factor of phi , the golden ratio . Image : Flickr / Tin.G. The San Francisco Bay salt flats pictured above have been VBN for commercial salt production for over a century . Below , an image from the largest salt NN in the NN , Salar de Uyuni , located in southern Bolivia . The encrusted salt shows a remarkably consistent but random pattern , a characteristic of fractals . Images : 1 ) Flickr / Tolka Rover . 2 ) Flickr / Mike D. Green . Extinct for 65 CD NNS , ammonites were marine cephalopods that built chambered spiral shells . The walls between these chambers , called sutures , were complex fractal curves . Stephen Jay Gould VBD the complexity of ammonite sutures over NN to argue that there is no evolutionary drive toward greater complexity and that we are a " glorious accident , " alone in the universe . The shells of ammonites RB grow as a logarithmic spiral , a pattern that appears often in nature , as with romanesco broccoli . Ammonites RB inspired this cathedral staircase in Barcelona , Spain . Images : 1 ) Flickr / cobalt123 . 2 ) Flickr / Didier.bier . 3 ) Flickr / Edgley Cesar Mountains are the result of tectonic forces pushing the crust upward and erosion tearing some of that crust down . The resulting pattern is a fractal . Above is an image of the Himalayan Mountains , home to JJ of the tallest peaks on NNP . The Himalayas are still being uplifted by the collision of India with the Eurasian plate , which began about 70 CD NNS ago . Image : NNP / GSFC / JPL , MISR Team . Ferns are a common example of a self - similar set , meaning that their pattern can be mathematically generated and reproduced at any magnification or reduction . The mathematical formula that describes ferns , named after Michael Barnsley , was CD of the JJ to show that chaos is inherently unpredictable yet generally follows deterministic rules VBN on nonlinear iterative equations . In other words , random numbers generated over and over VBG Barnsley 's Fern formula ultimately produce a unique fern - shaped object . Images : 1 ) Flickr / cobalt123 . 2 ) Flickr / CatDancing . The marine stratus clouds above were photographed by the Aqua satellite over the South Atlantic Ocean , off the west coast of Africa . A fractal cloud pattern is interrupted by a series of diagonal grooves . According the NNP NNP Observatory , it is highly unusual to VB such a sharp boundary in a continual cloud formation such as this , and NNS have yet to explain how it MD form . Below , the 200 - mile JJ series of cloud vortexes is perhaps the longest of these formations ever photographed , according to NNP . These cloud vortexes are RB called von Kármán cloud streets , for the late fluid dynamicist Theodore von Kármán . Cloud streets form when low - lying clouds are interrupted by an object such as an island . Similar patterns occur in the wind flow downstream of airplane wings . Images : 1 ) Jeff Schmaltz / MODIS Land Rapid Response Team / NNP . 2 ) NNP . JJ plants follow simple recursive formulas in generating their branching shapes and leaf patterns . Ironically , deforestation patterns that occur along primary , secondary and tertiary roadways form a similar pattern , IN that pictured below from the NN of Rondonia in western Brazil , CD of the most deforested regions of the Amazon . Images : 1 ) Flickr / CatDancing . 2 ) NNP . This JJ - color image above , of the Grand Canyon , displays the fractal pattern created by the Colorado River over millions of NNS . Red indicates areas of vegetation in the image . Below , a JJ - color image of Canyon de Chelly National Monument in Arizona . The National Park Service calls it CD of the longest continually inhabited landscapes in North NNP . Images : 1 ) GeoEye / NN Imaging . 2 ) NNP . The path lightning takes is formed step by step as it moves towards the ground , turning air into plasma . Images : 1 ) Flickr / thefost . 2 ) Flickr / Brujo +. Peacocks attract mates with the repeating patterns in their plumage . Images : 1 ) Flickr / Digimist . 2 ) Flickr / Maia C . Crystallizing NN forms repeating patterns in snowflakes and on frosty surfaces . The patterns have inspired claims about the NN of consciousness to affect matter , as well as CD of the JJ described fractal curves , the Koch snowflake . Images : 1 ) Flickr / mommamia . 2 ) Flickr / monteregina . Similar to canyons , a combination of rock irregularity and gravity produces repeating patterns as NN flows over the side of a sharp ledge . Image : Flickr / catdancing The Yukon River branches into thousands of distributary channels as it drains into the Bering NNP off the coast of Alaska . The river is flowing RB to left in the image , with the Bering NNP visible in the far left side of the image . Image : NNP .
