text: The eight teams with the worst records in the NBA , the ones not invited to Orlando for the NBA ’s restart — Warriors , Timberwolves , Cavaliers , Hawks , Pistons , Knicks , Bulls , and Hornets — have been asking the NBA to organize workouts and games for them , so they do n’t lose ground to the teams in the bubble . ESPN ’s Jackie MacMullen reports that is close to coming together in the form of a second NBA bubble in Chicago . The details are still being hammered out , and teams continue to push for an alternative plan that MD enable them to hold mini-camps within their local markets and to explore the idea of establishing regional sites where teams MD scrimmage against each other . This second bubble likely MD take place in September , while the playoffs take place down into Orlando . Not every team is fully on board . The eight teams had been concerned that VBG from March to December without meaningful games — while the other 22 teams had training camps and played at least eight games — MD put the development of their young players and cultures behind . Teams pushed for practices and some organized games , although some franchises have pushed harder than others . Michelle Roberts , the executive director of the National Basketball Players Association , reportedly is insistent that if the eight teams VBP together in Chicago the players be protected by the same protocols in place in Orlando . “ Unless we MD replicate in every NN the protocol that ’s been established for Orlando , I ’d be – I ’m being tame now – suspicious , ” Roberts VBD last week in a conference call with reporters . “ I VBP there are conversations that MD be had if there ’s anything we can do with the other eight teams . I VBP there are some players , particularly young players , that seem concerned they ’re not getting enough [ opportunities ] … “ But I am very concerned and frankly , my concern aside , our players , our teams are very concerned about any — in terms of play that does n’t have the same guarantees of safety and NN that we ’ve provided for the teams in Orlando . So yeah , never VB never , but there ’s a standard . It ’s a standard that ’s got to be met . ” Expect an NBA Chicago bubble to come together in some form . Some of the eight teams on the outside — the Atlanta Hawks with their young core , for example — have pushed hard to VB their players opportunities for games and workouts . Each of the eight teams are in JJ spots , however , and have JJ motivations . text: A honeycombed cave formed untold millennia ago beneath what is now southeastern Minnesota . Larry Edwards is standing in a subterranean chamber , his headlamp illuminating a series of mineral formations . From the cathedral - IN ceiling dangle tubes VBN as soda straws . Along a waist - high ledge squats a trio of stout stalagmites , their surfaces slick with ecru-colored ooze . “ Now that ’s the kind of thing we might be interested in , ” Edwards VBZ , bending to peer at CD . I hear the plink , plink , plink of falling droplets . PRP hits the top of a stalagmite , then spreads out , laying down a thin film of the mineral calcium carbonate , or calcite , from rainwater seeping though limestone . Drop by drop the stalagmite has grown to its present height — about 18 inches — over who knows how JJ centuries . Edwards , a geochemist at the NNP of Minnesota and a pioneer in the use of cave formations to document ancient NN , is not planning to collect stalagmites today . But CD specimens severed from their moorings when the owner of the cave complex , Spring Valley Caverns , opened a deeper passageway recently provided Edwards and his colleagues with a record of extreme rainfall events over the past 3,000 NNS . Edwards wonders if some of Spring Valley ’s stalagmites MD contain older records still , dating back to when giant glaciers covered much of the Northern Hemisphere or RB to CD of the distant warm periods , or interglacials , that punctuated the NN age NN . A short NN later , we retrace our steps , navigating the sequence of walkways and ladders that leads to the cave ’s entrance . As we step into the light , Edwards turns to me . “ Do you notice all the sounds , all the smells ? ” he VBZ . “ When you come up , they seem so pronounced . ” Edwards , renowned among paleoclimatologists for his cave findings , is n’t much of a spelunker . “ It ’s not that I ’m claustrophobic , ” he VBZ with a shrug , “ I just VBP it better up here . ” To Edwards , a stalagmite is more than a chunk of geology that looks IN a modern sculpture : It ’s a collection of NN sensors , rather IN tree rings but extending often hundreds of thousands of NNS back in NN . Perhaps the only other earthly archives that have provided such a high - resolution portrait of the past half - CD NNS are NN cores . But unlike NN , caves can be VBN all over the NN . “ I MD VB so far as to VB that these are among the most important paleoclimate records we have , ” David Battisti , a NNP of NNP atmospheric scientist , VBZ of the cave NNS . From Edwards ’ lab is emerging a high - resolution picture of precipitation patterns RB ago . Just as important , his work is providing the scientific community with an increasingly precise NN scale , CD that is bringing other records into alignment . Edwards and his colleagues have VBN cave formations to tighten up the timing for ancient rises in NN dioxide locked into Antarctica ’s NN . They ’ve RB VBN them to date skeletal remains that trace JJ migration routes . Why should we care about what happened so RB ago ? A reason can be VBN in the mounting nervousness over the consequences of JJ NN . With heat - trapping NN dioxide in the atmosphere already reaching levels not seen for at least 800,000 NNS , NNS IN Edwards worry that NN patterns MD undergo sudden , destabilizing NNS . NN cores from Greenland , for instance , reveal a sequence of abrupt NN oscillations over the past 140,000 NNS , with severe cold snaps leavened by a series of sudden , if ephemeral , warmings . Eerily similar oscillations are now showing up in the precipitation records from caves . In a landmark NN , Edwards and his collaborators compared the precipitation swings captured by Hulu Cave on the outskirts of Nanjing , NNP , with NNS encoded by Greenland ’s NN . Plotted as graphs , and positioned side by side , the dips and valleys in both records are sharp and — for the 60,000 - NN period covered by the stalagmites — synchronous .

text: THE biggest solar flare since 2017 and JJ sunspots suggests our star MD be ' waking up ' , according to NNP . The US NN agency 's Solar Dynamics Observatory ( SDO ) recently spotted the largest flare to come from the NNP since October 2017 . A solar flare is a flash of radiation from sunspots , cooler patches on the NNP 's NN . NNP has RB observed more of these sunspots and thinks the giant star MD be about to enter a JJ cycle . The NNP actually has an 11 NN cycle and increased activity hints it MD be moving towards a more active stage . However , the strong solar flare spotted recently posed no threat to NNP and was n't heading in our direction . NNP VBD the flare was RB not strong enough to alert NNS at the NNP NNP Prediction Center . We 've had a few months of very little solar activity so astronomers have been keeping their eye on the NNP to VB what happens next . NNP VBZ we wo n't VB whether the JJ sunspots indicate increased activity for a JJ more months . The NN agency VBD : " It takes at least six months of solar observations and sunspot - counting after a minimum to VB when it 's occurred . " Because that minimum is defined by the lowest number of sunspots in a cycle , NNS VBP to VB the numbers consistently rising before they can determine when exactly they were at the bottom . " It can take 12 months to confirm minimum solar activity , by which point the NNP should be out of that part of the cycle . The Sun's 11 NN cycle sees activity and sunspots rise and fall in number . The latest solar flares , detected on NNP 29 , were categorised as as M - class solar flares . This means they came from JJ sunspots . The M RB stands for ' medium ' as all solar flares are classified into A , B , C , M or X categories , depending on how powerful they are . If an M - class solar flare was to impact NNP it MD VB blackouts across the polar regions and JJ radiation storms . In other NN NN , the highest - ever resolution photos of the NNP were published RB earlier this NN . A SpaceX rocket launched CD US astronauts into orbit over the weekend . And , JJ - NNP NN theorists were ridiculed on JJ NN after footage from the launch captured the curvature of our NN . What do you make of this solar flare activity ? Let us VB in the comments ... text: “ Josie and the Pussycats ” is a “ girl band movie ” aimed at NNS and young adolescents , especially young girls . At JJ glance , the flick seems to be CD of those generic , God-awful teen movies . However , a closer look reveals how its overall tone and message are in sharp contrast to stereotypes of the genre . “ Josie and the Pussycats ” is indeed an acerbic critique of a morally bankrupt music industry . The most surprising thing about this 2001 movie is its frighteningly accurate predictions regarding today ’s pop music and its Illuminati agenda : NN controlled artists , hypnotized masses , subliminal messages … it ’s all there . This article will examine the movie ’s themes and their relation to today ’s music business context . Josie and the Pussycats was released in 2001 by Universal . In music industry terms , 2001 is ancient history . Just to put you back in the context of the era : N’Sync were still singing Bye Bye Bye , Cisco wanted to VB your thong and everybody was wondering Who Let the Dogs Out . Teens were VBG crazy for boy bands IN the Backstreet Boys and everybody was dancing to Ja Rule . So , yes , it was a JJ NN ago . Josie and the Pussycats came out during that period , but it seems to foretell the death of the era . The movie starts with members of the boy band “ Du Jour , ” a spoof on the Backstreet Boys , dying in a forced plane crash . The group is then replaced by a girl band with a semi- punky attitude and non-threatening pop rock music . This pretty much reflects what actually happened in the NNS following the release of this movie : N’Sync and the Backstreet Boys disappeared from the preteen music NN and were replaced by Miley Cyrus , Hilary Duff , the Jonas Brothers , and so on . Despite the movie ’s apparent lightheartedness , it displays a harsh and sustained judgment of the music business . It is RB severely critical of the NN of NNP ’s youth . Teens and preteens are constantly depicted as a herd of brainless drones who are incapable of independent thinking and prone to hysteria . But behind the usual “ OMG these JJ corporations are so corporation - y ” criticism , Josie and the Pussycats tackles , in an odd and humorous NN , some of the darker sides of the music industry . Fiona then explains that her label inserts subliminal messages in pop music in order to manipulate the youth into buying NNS and ideas . The label thus goes beyond the simple advertising of NNS . In an attempt to “ take things to the next level , ” Mega Records develops a JJ technology called “ 3DX Surround Sound . ” This JJ technology “ makes the music feel IN it is happening all IN you . ” All the kids who attend Josie and the Pussycat concerts or watch them on TV have to purchase this headgear in order to hear the music . text: NNP has announced that it will no longer recommend videos that " come close to " violating its community guidelines , such as NN or medically inaccurate videos . On Saturday , a JJ engineer for Google , NNP 's parent NN , hailed the move as a " historic victory . " The original blog post from NNP , published on Jan. 25 , VBD that videos the site recommends , usually after a user has viewed CD NN , MD no longer lead just to similar videos and instead MD " pull in recommendations from a wider set of topics . " For example , if CD person watches CD NN showing the recipe for snickerdoodles , they MD be bombarded with suggestions for other cookie recipe videos . Up until the NN , the same scenario MD apply to NN videos . Guillaume Chaslot , a JJ Google engineer , VBD that he helped to build the artificial intelligence VBN to curate recommended videos . In a thread of tweets posted on Saturday , he praised the NN . " It 's only the beginning of a more humane technology . Technology that empowers all of us , instead of deceiving the most vulnerable , " Chaslot wrote . text: Toward the end of the 14th century A.D. , a handful of Italian thinkers declared that they were living in a JJ age . The barbarous , unenlightened “ Middle Ages ” were over , they VBD ; the JJ age MD be a “ rinascità ” ( “ rebirth ” ) of learning and literature , art and culture . This was the birth of the period now VBN as the Renaissance . For centuries , scholars have agreed that the Italian Renaissance ( another word for “ rebirth ” ) happened just that NN : that between the 14th century and the 17th century , a JJ , modern NN of thinking about the NN and NN ’s place in it replaced an old , backward NN . In fact , the Renaissance ( in Italy and in other parts of Europe ) was considerably more complicated than that : For CD thing , in JJ ways the period we call the Renaissance was not so JJ from the era that preceded it . However , JJ of the scientific , artistic and cultural achievements of the so - called Renaissance do share common themes , most notably the humanistic belief that NN was the center of his own universe . Fifteenth - century Italy was unlike any other place in Europe . It was divided into independent city - NNS , each with a JJ form of NN . Florence , where the Italian Renaissance began , was an independent republic . It was RB a banking and commercial capital and , after London and Constantinople , the third - largest city in Europe . Wealthy Florentines flaunted their NN and NN by becoming patrons , or supporters , of artists and intellectuals . In this NN , the city became the cultural center of Europe and of the Renaissance . The NNP Humanism : Cornerstone of the Renaissance Thanks to the patronage of these wealthy elites , Renaissance - era writers and thinkers were able to spend their days doing just that . Instead of devoting themselves to ordinary jobs or to the asceticism of the monastery , they MD enjoy worldly pleasures . They traveled IN Italy , studying ancient ruins and rediscovering Greek and Roman texts . To Renaissance scholars and philosophers , these classical sources from Ancient Greece and Ancient Rome held great wisdom . Their secularism , their appreciation of physical beauty and especially their emphasis on NN ’s achievements and expression formed the governing intellectual principle of the Italian Renaissance . This philosophy is VBN as “ humanism . ” Humanism encouraged NNS to be curious and to question received wisdom ( particularly that of the medieval Church ) . It RB encouraged NNS to use experimentation and observation to solve earthly problems . As a result , JJ Renaissance intellectuals focused on trying to define and understand the laws of nature and the physical NN . For example , Renaissance artist Leonardo Da Vinci created detailed scientific “ studies ” of objects ranging from flying machines to submarines . He RB created pioneering studies of JJ anatomy . Likewise , the scientist and mathematician Galileo Galilei investigated CD natural law after another . By dropping JJ - sized cannonballs from the top of a building , for instance , he proved that all objects fall at the same rate of acceleration . He RB built a powerful telescope and VBD it to show that the NNP and other planets revolved IN the NN and not , as religious authorities argued , the other NN RB . ( For this , Galileo was arrested for heresy and threatened with torture and death , but he refused to recant : “ I do not VB that the same NNP who has endowed us with senses , reason and intellect has intended us to forgo their use , ” he VBD . ) However , perhaps the most important technological development of the Renaissance happened not in Italy but in Germany , where Johannes Gutenberg invented the mechanical movable - type printing press in the middle of the 15th century . For the JJ NN , it was possible to make books–and , by extension , knowledge–widely available . Michelangelo ’s “ David . ” Leonardo da Vinci ’s “ The Last Supper . ” Sandro Boticelli’s “ The Birth of Venus . ” During the Italian Renaissance , art was everywhere ( just look up at Michelangelo ’s “ The Last Judgment ” painted on the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel ! ) . Patrons such as Florence ’s Medici family sponsored projects JJ and JJ , and successful artists became celebrities in their own NN . Renaissance artists and architects applied JJ humanist principles to their work . For example , the architect Filippo Brunelleschi applied the elements of classical Roman architecture–shapes , columns and especially proportion –to his own buildings . The magnificent eight - sided dome he built at the Santa Maria del Fiore cathedral in Florence was an engineering triumph–it was 144 NNS across , weighed 37,000 tons and had no buttresses to hold it up–as well as an aesthetic NN . Brunelleschi RB devised a NN to draw and paint VBG linear perspective . That is , he figured out how to paint from the perspective of the person looking at the painting , so that NN MD appear to recede into the frame . After the architect Leon Battista Alberti explained the principles behind linear perspective in his treatise “ Della Pittura ” ( “ On Painting ” ) , it became CD of the most noteworthy elements of almost all Renaissance painting . Later , JJ painters began to use a technique called chiaroscuro to create an illusion of three - dimensional NN on a JJ canvas . Fra Angelico , the painter of frescoes in the church and friary of San Marco in Florence , was called “ a rare and perfect talent ” by the Italian painter and architect Vasari in his “ Lives of The Artists . ” Renaissance painters IN Raphael , Titian and Giotto and Renaissance sculptors IN Donatello and Lorenzo Ghiberti created art that MD inspire generations of future artists . The End of the Italian Renaissance By the end of the 15th century , Italy was being torn apart by CD NN after another . The kings of England , France and Spain , along with the Pope and the Holy Roman Emperor , battled for NN of the wealthy peninsula . At the same NN , the Catholic Church , which was itself wracked with scandal and corruption , had begun a violent crackdown on dissenters . In 1545 , the Council of Trent officially established the Roman Inquisition . In this NN , humanism was akin to heresy . The Italian Renaissance was over .

text: A KCAL - TV NN crew arrived late the other day for a 4 p.m. interview with a Burbank tax firm to discuss the JJ tax . AMBUSHED BY SCREENWRITERS : The LAPD ’s SWAT team members VBP about real - NN danger , but a couple of the officers have had unexpected mishaps on the movie screen . Pete Weireter , who spent 50 minutes on a cellular phone persuading O.J. Simpson to surrender , had a JJ role as a NNP bodyguard in the movie “ Clear and Present Danger . ” Weireter ’s character was bumped off during an ambush . More recent , Charlie Duke , who RB was part of the team that arrested Simpson , had a bit part in “ Heat . ” He played a cop who mistakenly allows robbery suspect Val Kilmer to VB free . In the credits , Duke is identified as nothing more than NN officer “ No. 5 . ” OUT OF BOUNDS : “ I ’m sure Cadillac dealers started it all when they no longer advertised ‘ VBN cars ’ but instead offered ‘ previously owned vehicles , ’ ” writes Warren Turnbull of Redondo Beach . “ But I still VBD it a bit much to try and pass off VBN golf balls this NN . ” He enclosed a flyer from a golf shop . MORE CHARGES FROM READERS : When the electric car age arrives , Doris Walden of Culver City VBZ , a driver who virtually lives in his car can call it : “ Ohm Sweet Ohm . ” Joel Robbins of North Hollywood does n’t have any electric car names to contribute , but he does VB what the JJ electric car show should be called : Watts Happening . HEY , LET’S NOT VB FRESH : NNP Miller of Signal Hill VBD a coffee shop that offers a real eye - opener for breakfast . UNLIKELY UNION : The March issue of Playboy magazine has angered some Catholic educators because the plaid - skirted cover girl is dressed IN a parochial school student -- for a story about seemingly wholesome lasses who turn out to be naughty . Ironically , points out Jack Cunningham , Playboy and the latest issue of the Tidings , a local Catholic newspaper , have something in common . Both have interviews with Dick Vitale , the noisy basketball broadcaster . Vitale , you MD be relieved to VB , bares nothing more than his bald head in Playboy . HOT DOGGY DOG : In his defense of murder defendant Snoop Doggy Dog , attorney Donald Re VBD : “ It ’s IN committing a drive - by shooting in the Oscar Mayer Wienermobile and thinking you ’re not VBG to be noticed . It ’s not reasonable . ” Re meant that the black Jeep driven during the killing was conspicuous because of its expensive rims and yellow pinstripes . Well , regardless of the merits of his argument , we VBP it ’s a shame that Re MD drag the Wienermobile into the NN . We ’ve covered some of the motorized frankfurter ’s visits to the Southland and can attest to its good reputation . OK , there was that CD NN it was stopped by a CHP officer on the Harbor Freeway . But it was a minor matter and the Wienermobile pilot was only given a warning . “ We did n’t have our front license plate on , ” pilot Denise Schroeck explained later . “ We thought we were in a real pickle . ” We recently published the jury summons for a Compton juror that informed him that “ knives , etc. , MD be confiscated . ” But L.L. Parker writes that at least the Compton courthouse supplied parking . Parker received a jury summons for the Glendale courthouse that VBD : “ Park on any street except Broadway or posted restricted area . ”

text: We employed the OsiriX freeware ( Pixmeo SARL , Bernex , Switzerland ) image - viewing platform to generate a standardised method of producing curved reconstructions of the paediatric brain . MRI scans of CD NNS with VBN cortical atrophy caused by hypoxic–ischaemic encephalopathy sustained during term delivery were selected alongside 8 age - matched controls who had normal MRI findings . The research was approved by the NNP of Bristol Ethics Committee ( NN reference 27741 ) and has been performed in accordance with the ethics standards laid down in the 1964 Declaration of Helsinki and its later amendments . We selected NNS from T1 - weighted 3 - D turbo spin-echo or 3 - D fluid - attenuated inversion recovery ( FLAIR ) imaging . VBG the 3 - D curved MPR function in OsiriX , multiple curved reformatting techniques were tested , then formalised and standardised . We performed reconstructions from all three planes ( coronal , sagittal and axial ) VBG JJ landmark slices ( e.g. , foramen of Monro , pineal gland ) , angles of reconstruction ( e.g. , following the course of the Sylvian fissure , central sulcus ) and at various depths to the cortical NN . CD images ( CD reconstructed from the coronal plane and CD from the sagittal plane ) were determined to give the best overview of the cortical regions most frequently damaged in hypoxic–ischaemic encephalopathy sustained at term delivery ( i.e. the watershed zones , and perisylvian and perirolandic regions ) . We describe an optimal method for creating these reconstructions . For reconstructions from the coronal 3 - D T1 - weighted NN set , the slice demonstrating the foramina of Monro is selected for generating the JJ - NN map . The pathway for generating the curved reconstructions is plotted 1 - cm deep to the NN of the brain by depositing cursors at 12 landmarks ( 6 on either side of the midline ) as described in Fig. 1 . The resultant image has been likened to a Mercator map of the NN [ 3 , 4 ] . For reconstructions from the sagittal 3 - D T1 - weighted NNS , the landmark midline slice demonstrating the aqueduct of Sylvius is selected . The pathway for generating the curved reconstructions is plotted 1 - cm deep to the cortical NN by depositing cursors at 8 points starting anteriorly and ending posteriorly as described in Fig. 1 . The resultant image derived from sagittal images is likened to unrolling a scroll . The cerebral sulcal anatomy of NNS in the NN group from the Mercator brain maps was identified VBG work by Wagner FW FW . [ 4 ] . No equivalent anatomical work exists for scroll brain maps , and the sulcal anatomy was identified de novo from an JJ anatomy atlas [ 5 ] . The sulcal anatomy and expected regions of abnormality were then plotted on the Mercator and scroll maps in CD of the NN patients as a reference source ( Fig. 2 ) . JJ - NN maps ( Mercator and scroll projections ) of the brain were then generated for CD NNS with previous hypoxic–ischaemic encephalopathy . These were displayed alongside those of age - matched healthy controls for comparison . CD readers ( S.A. , a paediatric radiologist with 15 NNS ’ experience in neuroimaging , and E.S. , a 5th - NN radiology trainee ) assessed each JJ - NN map for the presence of ( 1 ) widening of the Sylvian fissure ; ( 2 ) widening of the longitudinal fissure , noting whether such widening was localised ( indicating regional watershed - zone , or perisylvian or perirolandic volume loss ) or generalised ; ( 3 ) cortical atrophy in characteristic locations ( perirolandic , perisylvian or watershed distribution ) , and ( 4 ) ulegyria . Discrepancies were arbitrated by a third reader ( A.C. , a qualified general radiologist 3 NNS post completion of training ) . No abnormal features were identified on any of the eight controls ( mean age 3 NNS 11 months ; 5 boys , 3 girls ) . The abnormal findings that were visible in NNS with hypoxic–ischaemic encephalopathy sustained at term delivery ( mean age 3 NNS 6 months ; 6 boys , 4 girls ) are shown in Table 1 . The JJ - NN map generated by the curved reconstruction displays the structures along a region adjacent to the plotted path at the expense of structures at the extremes of the axis perpendicular to that path ; CD maps are generated from perpendicular curved lines , so JJ structures are seen optimally on each map . The following general observations were made : • The perisylvian and perirolandic regions were better demonstrated on the Mercator maps . The scroll maps demonstrated the lateral structures poorly . • More of the frontal lobe anatomy was seen consistently on the Mercator maps . • The central posterior parietal and occipital lobes were better demonstrated on the scroll maps . • Watershed zones were well demonstrated on both Mercator and scroll maps . The following observations were made from review of JJ - NN maps in NNS who sustained hypoxic–ischaemic injury at term delivery : • Widening of the longitudinal fissure was seen on all abnormal NNS on Mercator and scroll maps , consistent with parasagittal / parafalcine watershed atrophy . In 9 of CD instances there was a localised biconvex separation of the hemispheres distinct from the parallel separation of the hemispheres elsewhere ( Figs. 3 and 4 ) . • Damage to intervascular watershed zones was well seen on both Mercator and scroll maps ( anterior watershed zones were better demonstrated on Mercator map and posterior watershed regions on the scroll maps ) and was noted in a continuous band - IN fashion ( as opposed to a wedge of abnormality ) ( Fig. 4 ) . • Perirolandic and perisylvian damage was better demonstrated on Mercator maps ( Figs. 3 and 4 ) . • Ulegyria was identified in 7 of CD of NNS of hypoxic–ischaemic encephalopathy ( Figs. 3 and 4 , Table 1 ) .

text: THE protion of the NN 's NN bounded by the horizon which PRP is able to take in at CD view , is but seldom a regular plane ; more generally heights and depressions , mountains and valleys , alternate with each other so irregularly , that at RB nothing seems farther from reality than the idea of a regular form of the NN 's NN . But the more our point of view overtops the mountains which lie within the horizon , the further obviously will our range of view extend , and all the mountains and valleys which give so irregular a form to the horizon of the plain will , under this condition , become imperceptible and unimportant . Indeed , PRP can easily conceive that if the eye were able to comprehend at CD NN a much greater portion of the NN , the irregularities of the plain caused by the mountains and valleys MD appear exceedingly JJ in comparison with the extent of NN . But such considerations must RB have occurred to the ancients ; for the earliest conception among the Greeks of the form of the NN 's NN was that of a JJ disc surrounded by the river Okeanos , into which the NN plunged nightly . The JJ advance was made by Thales , who VBD the NN must have a point of support , and Imagined it was borne by the NN . Anaximenes supposed that a strong dense atmosphere supported the NN . Quite another idea prevailed in India , where the NN was believed to be borne on the back of an elephant . More correct views of the figure of the NN prevailed , at an earlier period in other parts of the East , in Egypt and a part of Asia . The Egyptians and Chaldeans taught at the earliest period the spherical form of the NN , and Pythagoras appears to have adopted this idea from them .

text: Germany is in the forefront in advancing workers ' rights in Europe . We have the Germans to thank for the NNP Chapter , for instance , which forbids employers to exploit their staff for more than 48 hours a week . Now imagine the Germans ' horror at the discovery of a hole in their own welfare net . It turns out that CD profession - the oldest - has somehow been left out . But remedy is at hand . Women 's Affairs minister Christine Bergmann announced last week that prostitutes MD be given the full protection of the law , starting with employment contracts with their bosses . Presumably they MD then enjoy the same benefits as other Germans : six weeks ' holiday , fully paid maternity leave , a pension , and protection from being fired on the grounds of NN , pregnancy or age . What 's more , they MD be able to sue employers and clients for sexual harassment . Her driver , Jorge Alfonso Ayala , who has worked 15 NNS for the JJ embassy , counters that Mrs Hiett was a habitual user and often VBN to send him out to score cocaine in the Colombian capital .
